title: [script] "Kendo"
content:
Hello, can you point me to this typeface, I am sorry for the few letters.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081026135624im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/kendo_5594.gif)

 [‹ Silent film drop caps?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081026135624/http:/www.typophile.com/node/31625 "Go to previous forum topic") [Chanel Font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081026135624/http:/www.typophile.com/node/31725 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Alessandro Segalini

comments.content:
Logo? How old? Possibly custom.

Alts: [Okay](http://web.archive.org/web/20081026135624/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=UR.116224.0.0&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=Kendo&sampleSize=48), [Flash](http://web.archive.org/web/20081026135624/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=verity.search&startrow=1&records=20&currpage=1&totalrecords=12&searchby=&searchID=&searchletter=&searchstr=flash&font_categories_checkbox=font_name_search&fontRendererText=Kendo), [Bello](http://web.archive.org/web/20081026135624/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=UW.118327.0.0&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=Kendo&sampleSize=48)

Got it. It’s the lovely [Blizzard](http://web.archive.org/web/20081026135624/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=UR.115264.0.0&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=Kendo%20&sampleSize=138) (lighter, sharper) or [Brush 738](http://web.archive.org/web/20081026135624/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=BT.122391.0.0&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=Kendo%20&sampleSize=138) (heavier, softer) by [Julius Kirn](http://web.archive.org/web/20081026135624/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Julius%252BKirn), released as Bison in 1935.

Thank you, Stephen, you rock, I forgot to say, that was done for a poster for a Kendo demo.  
Nice to know about “Bison,” that is quite interesting actually.
